Column.Name: ARRAY_ROW
Column.Description: subarray row

Column.Name: ARRAY_COLUMN
Column.Description: subarray column

Column.Name: ROW
Column.Description: spot row

Column.Name: COLUMN
Column.Description: spot column

Column.Name: NEW_CHIP_ID
Column.Description: CHIP# as of 020901

Column.Name: OLD_CHIP_ID
Column.Description: previous CHIP#

Column.Name: SEQUENCE
Column.Description: amplified sequence

Column.Name: PRIMARY_LT2_GENE
Column.Description: first first STM LT2 gene represented (>97%ID over 100bp & >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: SECONDARY_LT2_GENES
Column.Description: further LT2 genes represented (>97%ID over 100bp & >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: SINGLE_CRITERIUM_LT2_GENES
Column.Description: more LT2 genes represented (>97%ID over 100bp & >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: BEST_LT2_GENE
Column.Description: best represented STM#

Column.Name: LT2_GENE_NAME
Column.Description: best represented gene name in STM LT2

Column.Name: PRIMARY_CT18_GENE
Column.Description: first STY CT18 gene represented (>97%ID over 100bp & >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: SECONDARY_CT18_GENES
Column.Description: further CT18 genes represented (>97%ID over 100bp & >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: SINGLE_CRITERIUM_CT18_GENES
Column.Description: more CT18 genes represented (>97%ID over 100bp OR >90% over entire fragment)

Column.Name: BEST_CT18_GENE
Column.Description: best represented STY#

Column.Name: CT18_GENE_NAME
Column.Description: best represented gene name in STY CT18

Column.Name: SPT SIMILARITY
Column.Description: sequence similarity in SPT PT4 over 100bp window

Column.Description: sum of background subtracted median pixel intensities of both wavelengths

Column.Name: SUM_OF_MEANS
Column.Description: sum of background subtracted mean pixel intensities of both wavelengths

Column.Name: LOG_RATIO_CH1/CH2
Column.Description: log2 of means_ch1/ch2

Column.Name: CH1_MEAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: mean pixel intensity Cy5 (635nm) minus median background of the spot

Column.Name: CH2_MEAN_BKGR_CORR
Column.Description: mean pixel intensity Cy3 (532nm) minus median background of the spot

Column.Name: CH1%_OF_TOTAL
Column.Description: Channel 1 (Cy5 = 635nm) % of total

Column.Name: CH2%_OF_TOTAL
Column.Description: Channel 2 (Cy3 = 532nm) % of total

Column.Name: PRE-VALUE
Column.Description: Cy5 [635nm] % of total / Cy3 [532nm] % of total

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: log of Cy5 [635nm] % of total / Cy3 [532nm] % of total

Column.Name: FLAGS
Column.Description: Feature quality assessment
